MWCapture SDKv3 Software Development Library

Magewell SDKv3 defines library functions and a set of data structures, including Macros, Color Format, Enumration Types, Structures and Callback Functions. These data structures and library functions enable you to flexibly and efficiently incorporate the powerful features of our capture cards into your applications for your users to easily take advantage of.

Color Format

Color Format is a four-character code defined by a macro that represents the format of the video stream. The Color Format chapter within the SDK lists all video streaming formats that can be supported by each of our various capture device families, and the related functions in SDKv3.

Capture

SDKv3 is compatible with our Pro Capture, USB Capture Gen2 and USB Capture Plus device families. For specific products, please refer to MWCAP_PRODUCT_ID. Available functions vary depending on the hardware configuration, firmware version, drivers and product series that the capture card belongs to.

Depending on the compatibility of the capture devices you are working with, library functions are divided into the following categories:

  1. MWCapture SDKv3 Universal Functions
  2. MWCapture SDKv3 Pro/Eco Capture Family Universal Functions
  3. MWCapture SDKv3 Pro Capture Functions
  4. MWCapture SDKv3 Eco Capture Functions
  5. MWCapture SDKv3 USB Family Functions

Features

  1. Closed Caption
  2. HDR
  3. mw_venc
  4. mw_mp4
